yaja#mAnAyaq svAhEtiq tE dEqvatA# AqSiShaq upA#yaqn pa~jcaq kRutvOq vyAGA#rayatiq pa~jcA$kSharA paq~gktiH pA~gktO# yaqj~jO yaqj~jamEqvAva# rundhE &kShNaqyA vyAGA#rayatiq tasmA#dakShNaqyA paqSavO&~ggA#niq praha#rantiq prati#ShThityai BUqtEByaqstvEtiq srucaqmudgRu#hNAtiq ya Eqva dEqvA BUqtAstEShAqM tad-BA#gaqdhEyaqM 
tAnEqva tEna# prINAtiq pautu#dravAn pariqdhIn pari# dadhAtyEqShAM- [  ] 41
